input.topt: Enter token code, which is available in the Google Authenticator app on your phone

profileData.category: You must select the category and subcategory to proceed with the data entry

resource.ProfiledataIsReadOnly: Verify that a profile is read-only
resource.BulkuploaderCreate: Creation of bulk profile upload file
resource.BulkuploaderBatches: Reading and searching profiles from bulk upload
resource.BulkuploaderBatchesDelete: Deletion of profiles from bulk upload
resource.ProtoprofileRead: Search for profiles from bulk upload
resource.ProtoprofileCreate: Creation of profile metadata from bulk upload
resource.ProtoprofileUpdate: Modification of profile metadata from bulk upload
resource.ProtoprofileUpdateStatus: Acceptance and rejection of profiles from bulk upload
resource.PedigreeProfileAsocRead: Search Profiles for Association in Pedigree Searches
resource.PedigreeCourtCaseProfilesGet: Get Profiles Associated with the Case
resource.PedigreeCourtCaseProfilesPost: Associate a Profile with the Case
resource.PedigreeCourtCaseProfilesDelete: Remove Profile Association from a Case
resource.GetBatchModal: Search Batches to Associate with a Case
resource.MatchUpdateInterconnection: Update Match with Hit or Discard from Another Instance
resource.GetPenProfApp: Get Pending Approval Profiles from Lower Instances
resource.PostPenProfApp: Approve Pending Approval Profiles from Lower Instances
resource.DelPenProfApp: Reject Pending Approval Profiles from Lower Instances
resource.GetInfInsStatus: Get Possible Different Lower Instance Statuses

analyses.general: Configuration for the validity and quality of profiles according to the category to which they belong
analyses.minLocusPerProfile: Number of markers that must have allelic values. It can be specified based on K (a parameter representative of the kit).
analyses.maxAllelesPerLocus: Maximum number of alleles in a marker. Limits the number of contributors.
analyses.maxOverageDeviatedLoci: Number of markers with excess allelic values
analyses.mixture: Indicates that the category is evidence of more than one contributor
analyses.filiationDataRequired: Indicates that the category allows data such as the first and last name of the profiled individual
analyses.pedigreeAssociation: Indicates that association in a pedigree is allowed
analyses.replicate: Indicates that these profiles are sent to higher instances
analyses.allowManualLoading: Indicates that the category allows manual loading of profiles belonging to it

associations.general: Association rules specify the category to which profiles must belong in order to be associated with profiles whose category is being edited. Profiles whose category has association rules will not participate in the matching search until they have an associated profile that meets these association rules

matching.general: The rules specify against which type of profiles the matching searches are conducted, the minimum level of stringency, the algorithm used, the minimum number of systems they must have in common, and the maximum number of mismatches tolerated

modify.profileSelection: Select the profile whose category you want to change.

alias.general: Configuration of the aliases that this category has. These aliases are used in the “Specimen Category” column of the GeneMapper® file during bulk import

general.save: Save the changes made in the 4 sections
general.add: Add the rule to then be effectively saved

matches.groupStatus: Validation of the status of the grouping profile
matches.matchStatus: Validation of the status of the matching profile

scenario.save: Save the scenario with its hypotheses, parameters, and results
scenario.dropouts: Number of alleles found in this profile but not in the sample

marks.associated: Profile associated with the grouping profile

comparison.profiles: Select a profile to display in the comparison
comparison.chips: Hide the genotyping of the profile
comparison.differences: Highlight alleles present in the profiles but not in the sample
comparison.matches: Highlight alleles present in both the profiles and the sample

profiles.responsible: Administrator user of the genetic profile and its matches

pedigree.boundary: Minimum probability for accepting profiles in the match by compatibility process
pedigree.frequencyBase: Frequency base used to generate possible genotypes of the individuals of interest

comparison.differences: Highlight different alleles in the selected profiles
comparison.matches: Highlight matching alleles in the selected profiles

add.chromosome: Chromosome where the marker is located (1-22, X, Y, XY, MT)
add.minimumAllelesQty: Minimum number of alleles to enter in a reference analysis
add.maximumAllelesQty: Maximum number of alleles to enter in a reference analysis

alias.add: Add an alias for bulk import

links.check: Link the marker with other markers of the same type
links.select: Select a marker from the same chromosome to link

add.save: Save the marker with its aliases and possible linked markers

mt.mutation:
E.g., Insertion: 239.1C 
E.g., Substitution: A73G 
E.g., Deletion: A249DEL

alias.add: Add an alias for bulk import

kits.save: Save the kit with its aliases and markers

format.bulkUpload:
MITOCHONDRIAL: Mutation nomenclature:
Insertions: 239.1C
Substitution or nucleotide change: A73G
Deletions: A249DEL
format.baseFrequency:
Header example:
allele,TH01,D21S11
Row example:
4,0.00006,
Separate with commas. Do not use 0.
You can indicate an fmin that will be used in calculations:
fmin,0.00006,0.00005

aliases: Write the alias and then press tab or enter. To delete it, use the keyboard or the x. No duplicates allowed.
